CustomField.description: **Required/Do Not Modify Picklist Values** "Cash Receipt" receipts are used to record inbound cash such as customer payments. "Cash Payment" receipts are used to record outbound cash such as refunds.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: **Required/Do Not Modify Picklist Values** "Cash Receipt" receipts are used to record inbound cash such as customer payments. "Cash Payment" receipts are used to record outbound cash such as refunds.
CustomField.label: Type
